name: Frizzeles (Friselle)
author: AllieGeekPi
summary: Italian pepper biscuits are great for holidays and every day. Serve with antipasto on Easter.
directions: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
Whisk flour, baking powder, salt, and black pepper together in a bowl
Stir olive oil and cold water into dry ingredients, mixing to make a soft dough
Pinch off a handful of dough, roll into a thick log between your hands,  and use a scissors to cut into pieces about 2 inches long
Place biscuits about 1 1/2 inches apart on baking sheets
Bake in the preheated oven on middle rack for 15 minutes; flip biscuits and bake until golden brown on both sides, about 15 minutes more
Let cool on pieces of waxed paper
Place biscuits into a sealed container and refrigerate overnight for best flavor
